thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Shirley Garcia
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Shirley Garcia

author: Shirley Garcia
title: Shirley Garcia
text:
I am taking my granddaughter to Costa Rica to celebrate her birthday. After reading a positive review about Molly on Travelosity, I contacted her and she customized an amazing trip to see the wildlife in Costa Rica. She arranged for someone to pick us up on arrival at airport and take us to our resort, she planned a small group tour for us each day such as a small boat ride down a river, hike and walking across suspension bridge in a tropical forest. I don't leave for 5 months but I have already received a detailed itinerary with pick up times and telephone numbers. I'm impressed!
Shirley, Mission Viejo, Ca
